name: Ghostlords
description: Ghostlords is a strategic turn-based RPG that tells the story of a post-apocalyptic haunted Great Britain. Experience the new world, capture wild spirits, and put together a team of ghosts to help you battle the forces of evil.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 800x600+ Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Great game, imagine a roguelike with Pokemon style battles and Shin Megami Tensei atmosphere. Lots of starter ghosts to unlock and abundant achievements add a lot of replay value. Still a little buggy, I had to restart a campaign because of an encounter in which none of the dialogue was actually selectable, but all in all still a fun game.
